biotools.summary: This tool takes as input several lists of activated and repressed genes. It then searches through a compendium of publicly available gene expression profiles for biological contexts that are enriched with a specified pattern of gene expression. Finally, it provides both traditional R functions and an interactive, user-friendly interface.

bioschemas.name: GSCA
